Articles.Content:
This add-on includes a save file. "What's so special about this save file?", you may ask. Well, it is the same starting scenario that you might see when opening a new career mode game in version 0.25. The save file has all buildings upgraded to the maximum level so you can play career with only funds and contracts.

Features

  • All buildings maxed from start
  • No more upgrading necessary
  • Play career like you used to before .90

To install:

-Download file

-Unzip

-Locate KSP folder (C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program)

-Open "saves" subfolder

-Drag and drop "Old Career Start" folder into "saves"

-Enjoy!

OPTIONAL: Rename the folder and line of text in persistent.sfs to change the name of your game

TIP: Keep the zip so you can start your old career games over and over again (to reinstall repeat the above steps, no deleting necessary)

Download: https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/654/Old%20Career%20Start

Edited March 22, 2015 by legochamp75
